name: Pool
overview: Play  the  great  game of pool either 8 ball or 15 ball both for two players. It is  a  truly  amazing  verison  of  the game of pool using full sound and colour graphics.  It  brings to you the action of the real game into your own home. Use your skill and judgement and play like the professionals. The screen prompts you to  choose  either the 8 or 15 ball game. The cursor is first of all prompted by using  the  keys  enter/return. Then play resumes by prompting the cursor to the ball  you  wish to play, and then deciding the amount of power and spin you wish to use. Players scores are highlighted at the top of the screen.
